message: I propose we divide the money 70/30 in favor of Alice. This is a fair offer considering the diminishing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I propose we split the money 60/40 in my favor. This is a fairer split given the diminishing value of money for you in the next round.  Let's be reasonable and avoid further losses.
I propose we equally divide the remaining amount, acknowledging the loss in value but aiming for fairness in our distribution.
